responses.gpt4: That's great to hear. We just performed a simple CHF assessment. You're doing a fantastic job managing your symptoms. It's also important to keep track of these symptoms daily. Do you have any questions about this?
responses.our_model: That's great. We just performed a simple CHF assessment. It's a good idea to do this at home every day. I understand that keeping track of symptoms can be complicated. Do you have any questions about how to do so?
